item.title: Crowdsec & Traefik: Automating Security in Your Homelab
item.description: Crowdsec & Traefik: Automating Security in Your Homelab Hello there! Today, I’m thrilled to introduce you to Crowdsec, an open-source Security threat intelligence project that’s perfect for boosting security in your homelab. Prerequisites Before we embark on our journey into a safer network, let’s check off these prerequisites: Prior experience with networking and a good understanding of network protocols. Some exposure to Docker as we’ll be using Docker-Compose for the setup.
